category.name: Administration.Access Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_show_all_aces
preference.preference_description: Influences the Access Control Entries (ACEs) displayed in the Access Control List (ACL) dialog. Valid values are: * false: To display only the ACEs relevant to the session user and the object ACLs. This is the default value. * true: To display all ACEs relevant to the object.
